name: Add new G Suite users to Google Sheets
description:
Every time a new user is created in G Suite, Make will automatically add a row to the Google Sheets spreadsheet of your choice.
The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Tblh6QzYDXZIYFEQkNGvC4iTVEorKMe2kGulBN9hcu8/edit?usp=sharing).
